item.title: 神奇宝贝》35 亿美元交易背后的整合战略
item.description:
视频游戏制造商 Scopely 为沙特主权财富基金所有

。【原文：

Video-game maker Scopely is owned by Saudi sovereign wealth fund

】

item.title: Balyasny 的 5000 万美元薪酬交易吸引了 Citadel 交易员 Brodsky
item.description: 德米特里-巴利亚斯尼（Dmitry Balyasny）的股票投资团队又添一名高薪雇员：Citadel 交易员 David Brodsky 专攻健康类股票。【原文：Dmitry Balyasny has added another expensive hire to his equities investing team: Citadel trader David Brodsky, who specializes in health stocks.】

item.title: 克利夫-阿斯内斯的 AQR 以 "投资失败 "为由抨击缓冲-ETF 热潮
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）公开反对在股票下跌期间限制损失的期权驱动型基金的兴起，声称这种日益增长的投资组合保险形式与更简单的替代品相比，收益更低，风险更大。【原文：AQR Capital Management has come out swinging against the rise of options-powered funds that limit losses during stock downturns, claiming this growing form of portfolio insurance delivers lower returns — with more risk — than simpler alternatives.】

item.title: 各国称马斯克的宽带卫星需要长期成本
item.description: 特朗普政府正在对一项价值 420 亿美元的宽带补贴计划进行修改，该计划将使埃隆-马斯克的 Starlink 等卫星互联网提供商受益，但一些州和联邦官员担心，这项技术还不够强大，无法以负担得起的价格大规模连接美国人。【原文：The Trump administration is making changes to a $42 billion broadband subsidy program that will benefit satellite internet providers like Elon Musk’s Starlink, but some state and federal officials worry the technology isn’t robust enough to connect Americans on a mass scale and at affordable rates.】

item.title: 贝恩资本将收购 Ambienta 旗下软件公司 Namirial
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本正在从私募股权公司 Ambienta 收购 Namirial SpA 的多数股权，对这家意大利软件开发商的估值为 11 亿欧元（12 亿美元）。【原文：Bain Capital is acquiring a majority stake in Namirial SpA from private equity firm Ambienta, valuing the Italian software developer at €1.1 billion ($1.2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: AT&T 正在洽谈收购 Lumen 的消费光纤部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，AT&T 公司正在洽谈收购 Lumen Technologies 公司的消费光纤业务。【原文：AT&T Inc. is in talks to acquire Lumen Technologies Inc.’s consumer fiber operations, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: ChatGPT 现在可以更好地编辑照片并创建工作图表
item.description: OpenAI 正在使 ChatGPT 更容易编辑图片，并为包含冗长、易读文本的工作创建视觉效果，这可能会扩大聊天机器人对企业和普通用户的吸引力。【原文：OpenAI is making it easier to edit images in ChatGPT and create visuals for work that include lengthy, legible text, potentially broadening the chatbot’s appeal for businesses and everyday users.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行估值达 1000 亿欧元 欧盟银行历史性反弹
item.description: 随着投资者越来越多地涌入银行业，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）成为欧盟近十年来首家估值超过 1,000 亿欧元（1,080 亿美元）的银行。【原文：Banco Santander SA has become the first bank currently in the European Union in almost a decade to be valued at more than €100 billion ($108 billion) as investors increasingly pile into the sector.】

item.title: 胡塞武装袭击聊天中心活动人士青睐的信号应用程序
item.description: 特朗普政府官员用来讨论攻击也门胡塞叛军的消息应用程序 Signal 是由一名曾经的无政府主义者创建的，目的是帮助活动家、记者和其他人在政府情报机构的窥探范围之外进行交流。【原文：The messaging app Signal that Trump administration officials used to discuss an attack on Yemen’s Houthi rebels was created by a one-time anarchist to help activists, journalists and others communicate beyond the prying eyes of government intelligence agencies.】

item.title: 关税激怒债券，DoubleLine 的谢尔曼开始防守
item.description: 双线资本（DoubleLine Capital）的杰弗里-谢尔曼（Jeffrey Sherman）对试图应对关税威胁和经济忧虑的债券投资者有一个忠告：现在不是大起大落的时候。【原文：DoubleLine Capital’s Jeffrey Sherman has a word of advice for bond investors trying to navigate tariff threats and economic worries: now is not the time to take big swings.】

item.title: 约翰-艾尔沃德的索纳公司从美国银行和巴克莱银行聘请高级经理人
item.description: 约翰-艾尔沃德（John Aylward）的索纳资产管理公司（Sona Asset Management）为其投资团队聘请了两名高级经理，这家信贷公司将继续进行全球扩张。【原文：John Aylward’s Sona Asset Management hired two senior managers for its investment team as the credit firm continues its global expansion.】

item.title: 苹果准备在 6 月 9 日的开发者大会上发布新软件
item.description: 苹果公司计划于 6 月 9 日举行年度全球开发者大会，预计届时将宣布重新设计的 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 操作系统。【原文：Apple Inc. plans to hold its annual Worldwide Developers Conference during the week of June 9, when it’s expected to announce redesigned iPhone, iPad and Mac operating systems.】

item.title: 埃尔多安小心翼翼地平息抗议和平息市场
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）正在采取措施，确保全国各地的抗议活动不会恶化，并遏制金融市场的崩溃，即使他对反对者施压。【原文：Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan is taking steps to ensure protests across the country don’t worsen and to contain a rout in financial markets, even as he turns the screws on opponents.】

item.title: CATL 获中国同意继续出售香港股票
item.description: 当代安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.安培瑞斯科技有限公司已获得中国批准，将在香港进行一次可能具有重大意义的股份销售。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. has received China’s approval to proceed with a potentially blockbuster share sale in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 化肥生产商 CF Industries 因黑海停火协议而下滑
item.description: 化肥生产商 CF Industries Holdings Inc. 下跌超过 4%，成为 S&P 500 指数中表现最差的基础材料类股票，此前黑海停火提升了放松对俄罗斯贸易制裁的前景。【原文：Fertilizer producer CF Industries Holdings Inc. fell more than 4%, making it the worst-performing basic-materials stock in the S&P 500 Index, after a Black Sea ceasefire raised prospects for easing trade sanctions against Russia.】

item.title: 乌克兰天然气储备不足，欧洲天然气进口量将创历史新高
item.description: 由于俄罗斯对能源基础设施的攻击以及燃料缓冲区的迅速耗尽，乌克兰将从欧洲进口创纪录水平的天然气，从而推高需求。【原文：Ukraine is set to import record levels of gas from Europe as Russian attacks on energy infrastructure and the rapid depletion of fuel buffers have pushed up demand.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行降息既不会完成也不会自动进行
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲中央银行仍有进一步降息的余地，但其决策的步伐和幅度都是未决问题。【原文：The European Central Bank still has scope for further interest-rate cuts, though the pace and extent of its decisions are open questions, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 引擎资本正推动对 Lyft 进行战略审查
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社查阅的一封信，Engine Capital 已入股 Lyft 公司，并正在推动对该打车应用进行战略审查。【原文：Engine Capital has taken a stake in Lyft Inc. and is pushing for a strategic review of the ride-hailing app, according to a letter reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团开始与银行商谈德比尔斯首次公开募股的可能性
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）已开始与银行就旗下戴比尔斯钻石公司（De Beers）上市事宜进行初步谈判，该公司正寻求推进其彻底重组的最后也是最困难的部分。【原文：Anglo American Plc has begun initial talks with banks about listing its De Beers diamond unit, according to people familiar with the matter, as the company looks to move ahead with the final and most difficult piece of its radical restructuring.】

item.title: 英国央行关注的英国薪酬数据遭经济学家质疑
item.description: 经济学家对英国官方数据的准确性提出了新的质疑，他们警告说，首次在劳动力市场数据中出现的问题 "只是冰山一角"。【原文：Fresh doubts over the accuracy of Britain’s official data have been raised by economists, who warned that the problems first seen in the labor market figures are “just the tip of the iceberg.”】

item.title: 首席执行官称，特拉菲古拉公司在蒙古的 11 亿美元欺诈案 "令人惭愧
item.description: 特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）在蒙古涉嫌多年欺诈，损失 11 亿美元，这家贸易巨头的新任首席执行官在首次就丑闻发表公开评论时表示，这是一次 "令人惭愧的经历"。【原文：Trafigura Group’s $1.1 billion loss in a suspected multi-year fraud in Mongolia was a “humbling experience,” the trading giant’s new chief said in his first public comments on the scandal.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚将关键利率维持在 15%，以抑制高通胀率
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚的货币政策制定者将基准利率维持在 15%，以抑制高企的通货膨胀。【原文：Ethiopian monetary policymakers kept the benchmark interest rate at 15% to curb elevated inflation.】

item.title: 特朗普加强制裁，看涨石油期权赌注激增
item.description: 交易商们一直在抢购看涨石油期权，以规避美国制裁将导致价格飙升的风险。【原文：Traders have been snapping up bullish oil options to hedge against the risk that US sanctions will cause prices to spike.】

item.title: EQT 新任私人资本主管将负责更多私有化交易
item.description: EQT AB 新上任的私人资本部门领导人表示，在市场波动加剧之际，EQT AB 正在公开市场寻求交易机会。【原文：EQT AB is seeking dealmaking opportunities in the public markets at a time of heightened market volatility, according to the newly-minted leaders of its private capital arm.】

item.title: 华尔街认为股市暴跌将结束，而欧洲竞争对手却并不确定
item.description: 在对股市的看法上，地域鸿沟正在扩大，欧洲银行比普遍乐观的美国银行更持怀疑态度。【原文：There’s a geographical divide growing in views of the stock market, with European banks more skeptical than their generally sanguine US rivals.】

item.title: 陷入困境的学院将校长住宅的使用权交给债券持有人
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚州的一所私立天主教大学拉罗什大学（La Roche University）正在向债券持有人提供校长住宅的抵押贷款作为额外保护。【原文：La Roche University, a private Catholic university in Pennsylvania, is giving bondholders a mortgage on the college president’s home as extra protection.】

item.title: 德国税务交易案中五名银行家必须接受审判
item.description: 在法兰克福上诉法院推翻了一项撤销案件的裁决之后，五名德国前银行家必须就他们参与二十多年前德国储蓄银行（Deutsche Pfandbrief）Cum-Cum 税收交易一事接受审判。【原文：Five German ex-bankers must stand trial over their involvement in Cum-Cum tax deals struck more than twenty years ago at Deutsche Pfandbrief after a Frankfurt appeals court overturned a decision throwing out the case.】

item.title: 特朗普寻找额外数万亿美元的途径之一
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 特朗普停止资助哥伦比亚大学引来学术联盟起诉
item.description: 两个教育工会就特朗普政府扣留哥伦比亚大学 4 亿美元联邦资金一事提起诉讼，称此举是限制校园学术独立和言论自由的非法企图。【原文：Two educational unions sued the Trump administration over its withholding of $400 million in federal funding from Columbia University, calling the move an illegal attempt to limit academic independence and free speech on campus.】

item.title: 财政部长离职迫使哥伦比亚央行维持利率不变
item.description: 在财政部长上任仅三个月就意外离职后，分析人士认为哥伦比亚央行在下次会议上放弃降息想法的可能性增大。【原文：Analysts see increased odds that Colombia’s central bank will ditch the idea of an interest-rate cut at its next meeting in the wake of the finance’s minister surprise exit just three months into the job.】
